org.apache.james.util.io
Class ClassLoaderObjectInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.ObjectInputStream
          org.apache.james.util.io.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.ObjectInput, java.io.ObjectStreamConstants
public class ClassLoaderObjectInputStream
extends java.io.ObjectInputStream

A special ObjectInputStream to handle highly transient classes hosted by Avalon components that are juggling many classloaders.

Version:
$Revision: 464742 $ $Date: 2006-10-17 00:53:00 +0100 (Tue, 17 Oct 2006) $
